title: Wedding Plan
overview: Namnuea, the professional wedding planner, is assigned to take care of the marriage between Sailom, the handsome young businessman and Yiwa, his perfect future bride. But what will happen when Namnuea finds out that this wedding he is planning is just a setup and Yiwa already has a lover named Marine. What kind of story awaits to unfold as the groom and wedding planner become closer?
